string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious crystal that holds great dexterity. Used for level 5 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious crystal that holds great luck. Used for level 10 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious crystal that holds great darkness. Used for level 9 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mythical rock with the power of magic in it. Used with high-leveled skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mythical rock with the power of summoning in it. Used with high-leveled skills.

string.name: desc
string.value: A brown magic powder used for level 4 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A white magic powder used for level 7 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue magic powder used for level 3 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green magic powder used for level 5 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yellow magic powder used for level 6 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple magic powder used for level 10 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red magic powder used for level 8 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black magic powder used for level 9 crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strength-infused powdered jewels. Collect several to exchange for a Magical Jewel Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: Luck-infused powdered jewels. Collect several to exchange for a Magical Jewel Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wisdom-infused powdered jewels. Collect several to exchange for a Magical Jewel Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dexterity-infused powdered jewels. Collect several to exchange for a Magical Jewel Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A doll made out of straw.

string.name: desc
string.value: A doll made out of wood.

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody wants a piece of this book. It's full of mysterious words.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stuffed animal with the Sage Cat's soul trapped inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A training certificate you get for defeating the Master Dummy. It shows you trained for a very long time.

string.name: desc
string.value: An intact anti-magic stone. You can exchange anti-magic collected in Anti-magic items and stones with Kritias Commemorative Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small acorn that squirrels were playing with.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thorns from Red Porky's back. Ouch!

string.name: desc
string.value: Thorns from Black Porky's back. Ouch!

string.name: desc
string.value: Quality snake leather. The snake's patterns are featured clearly on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flower off of a Red Flower Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red marble from a Giant Centipede.

string.name: desc
string.value: A belt given to bears at the beginning of their training.

string.name: desc
string.value: An antler of a White Deer, which you broke off...

string.name: desc
string.value: A seed spat out by a Peach Monkey.

string.name: desc
string.value: Only experienced bears are allowed to wear these.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of a broken pot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hot pot that contains water that's been boiling with ginseng for a long time.

string.name: desc
string.value: A common bellflower you can find in the mountains.

string.name: desc
string.value: A super old bellflower grown to be a hundred years old.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of a pirate map.

string.name: desc
string.value: Key to the pirates' Navigation Room.

string.name: desc
string.value: A voyage logbook of Lord Pirate's piracy activities

string.name: desc
string.value: Lord Pirate's hand, shaped like a hook.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Patrol Robot's memory card. It's used to control the Robot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A water bottle stolen by the Water Thief.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black trash bag that came out of a Dust Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tentacle from the side of a Streetlight.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Patrol Robot S's memory card. It's used to control the Robot.

string.name: desc
string.value: Guard Robot E's memory chip. It's used to control the Robot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of trash from the Trash Can.

string.name: desc
string.value: A wooden board from the Strange Sign.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sign carried by Safety First.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rock fragment obtained from Baby Boulder Muncher.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rock fragment obtained from Big Boulder Muncher. Looks like this can be carved into a jewel...

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong shield made from rocks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A work shovel carried by Racoco.

string.name: desc
string.value: The antenna of a Big Spider.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cart pushed around by Cart Bears.

string.name: desc
string.value: A safety hat worn by Raco.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sample taken from an Ore Muncher.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rare Rue ore imbued with the heat and pressure of the underground.

string.name: desc
string.value: Guard Robot L's memory chip. It's used to control the robot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A card key that can be used to deactivate the Security System.

string.name: desc
string.value: Parts that make up the Enhanced Security System.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken bulb from the head of an Android.

string.name: desc
string.value: Poison Gas created from a Poison Gas Generator.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transparent blob of gelatin. Do not eat.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red fruit from Megran that is used as a rare medicine ingredient.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare leaf from Rumo. It's full of life, but loses it the more you handle it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flask used for all kinds of fancy science-looking things.

string.name: desc
string.value: Unidentified purple liquid that might be toxic. Or delicious. Hard to tell.

string.name: desc
string.value: Iron Mutae are covered in this stuff.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just try breaking this steel. I dare you.

string.name: desc
string.value: This came from a Mithril Mutae, probably not by choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Was part of a Reinforced Mithril Mutae, before you decided to recycle it.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scorpion stinger has seen better days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beaker that just REEKS of science.

string.name: desc
string.value: You need this for Homunculus Alchemy. No one knows why.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extracted from a Homunculus. The enchantments have the ability to reveal truths.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mystical stone forged by alchemy. It's a pretty safe bet that it contains some kind of power.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nasty old stinger. Still looks dangerous.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even Neo Huroids need to be plugged in.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broken mechanical heart. It looks like it can be repaired and used again, if it can work through its issues.

string.name: desc
string.value: Poachers carry these certificates around to tell each other apart.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Teddy Bear really spilled his guts.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks just like a real panda!

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute toy duck on wheels. Look at it go!

string.name: desc
string.value: A toy soldier's plastic sword. Somewhat less effective than you current weapon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Still has a little juice left in it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Custom batteries are such a pain to replace.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tiny spring of a clock. Couldn't be THAT important.

string.name: desc
string.value: This thing just keeps on ticking.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just another cog in the machine...

string.name: desc
string.value: A worm that feeds on time. Maybe it's a metaphor...

string.name: desc
string.value: Grandpa Clock's still got some old springs kicking around. He really should get with the times.

string.name: desc
string.value: This teddy bear is like a luxury suite for ghosts. For children 2 and up!

string.name: desc
string.value: This teddy paw was holding another teddy. It's bears all the way down.

string.name: desc
string.value: This plushy used to be possessed by a ghost. Don't worry, the ghost is gone. Probably.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spirit from the Soul Teddy. Looks pretty happy to be free.

string.name: desc
string.value: Big and unwieldy. Watches have come a long way from this.

string.name: desc
string.value: You know how people always wish for more time? Well, here's your chance!

string.name: desc
string.value: This ball popped right off of Lazy Buffy's hat. Like everything else in Maple World, it looks like it holds a mysterious power.

string.name: desc
string.value: How's Alishar supposed to get into his car now?!

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like those Ghost Pirates won't be going anywhere in a hurry.

string.name: desc
string.value: Good job dooming the Dual Ghost Pirates to drift aimlessly for eternity.

string.name: desc
string.value: Still right twice a day. But only about evil things.

string.name: desc
string.value: Needed to get into all the coolest Viking parties.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can smell the mead and sweat on this thing from a mile away.

string.name: desc
string.value: Should still be good if you thaw it out.

string.name: desc
string.value: This can keep the Phantom Watch bottled up.

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks broken, but the sand doesn't spill out. Mysterious!

string.name: desc
string.value: The official colors of the Memory Monks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Memory Monk Trainees. Obviously a mark of respect.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Memory Guardians. Helps keep the memories in.

string.name: desc
string.value: Heart of the Chief Memory Guardian. Doesn't he need this?

string.name: desc
string.value: The Whale of Time is rather fond of this hat.

string.name: desc
string.value: The official colors of the Qualm Monks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Qualm Monk Trainees. They have no qualms with it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Qualm Guardians. Keeps them qualm.

string.name: desc
string.value: Heart of the Chief Qualm Guardian. Kinda gross when you think about it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Protects the identity of Lilynouch, the Ice Knight.

string.name: desc
string.value: The official colors of the Oblivion Monks.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Oblivion Monk Trainees. They seem oblivious to it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hat that is worn by Oblivion Guardians. Protects from oblivion-related injuries.

string.name: desc
string.value: Heart of the Chief Oblivion Guardian. He might want it back at some point.

string.name: desc
string.value: A noble Griffey horn. Great for making jewelry.

string.name: desc
string.value: This would probably make a great weapon if it was still whole. Look at all those icy runes...

string.name: desc
string.value: Imagine the weapon that must have been attached to this frozen thing.

string.name: desc
string.value: All that's missing is the ball. Maybe it melted. Too bad that's the important part.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even as busted up as it is, this bow looks like it could shoot some wicked frosty arrows.

string.name: desc
string.value: Somehow this feather is as cold and heavy as a gigantic block of ice. Magic!

string.name: desc
string.value: The runes on this thing are hot to the touch. What kind of weapon was it...?

string.name: desc
string.value: Despite the wrappings, this hilt is almost too hot to handle.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even without the ball, this thing is hot enough to do some damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can tell by the markings that this bow used to shoot some white-hot arrows.

string.name: desc
string.value: A decorative feather that's both hot and as heavy as a burning rock.

string.name: desc
string.value: You're not sure what the runes on this say, but you get the feeling it's nothing good.

string.name: desc
string.value: This hilt feels terrible and threatening, despite not having anything dangerous attached to it.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's just a chain and a shaft, but they radiate such a sense of dread...

string.name: desc
string.value: You can feel the agony of lost souls shot through with this ancient bow. Creepy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A feather that weighs much more than it looks. It's also totally evil.

string.name: desc
string.value: Even cheap cloth like this is infused with magic. You can't throw a rock without hitting a magical artifact, it seems.

string.name: desc
string.value: This dark fabric radiates mysterious power. That makes sense, considering its intended use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of mysterious fabric surrounded by black energy. Guess evil magic is pretty popular these days.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sharp claw from a poacher's hawk.

string.name: desc
string.value: Grave robbers carry these certificates around to tell each other apart.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fang from the grave robber's hunting dogs. Seems sharp enough to pierce anything.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pair of glowing wings from a Neon Bat. Might work like a flashlight in the dark.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment of a glowing primary rock.

string.name: desc
string.value: A curious substance from a Peace Spirit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This piece of darkness is thick with shadow.

string.name: desc
string.value: You feel the same mysterious energy in this that you felt from the Omen.

string.name: desc
string.value: You feel the same mysterious energy in this that you felt from the Master Omen.

string.name: desc
string.value: A part from the Barrier Demolisher.

string.name: desc
string.value: This memory chip is all that's left of a Surveillance Robot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rose petal frozen from centuries in the snow. Doesn't seem tasty, so you might as well sell it at the shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old chain that clangs around in your inventory. All that noise is making you mad. You should sell it at the shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dried rose vine. It makes the Golems look a bit prettier.

string.name: desc
string.value: Shining bees drop these shining powders. Maybe the shops will take this shiny thing for a lot of money.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you watch them closely, you can see that these lime powders are moving by themselves. Suspicious!

string.name: desc
string.value: Light, weak bronze ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (brown).

string.name: desc
string.value: Tough steel ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (blue).

string.name: desc
string.value: Light, solid mithril ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (green).

string.name: desc
string.value: Heavy, strong adamantium ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (brown).

string.name: desc
string.value: The ore of a shiny silver

string.name: desc
string.value: An ore of a very rare mineral, Orihalcon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rare gold ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (yellow).

string.name: desc
string.value: Lidium Ore that is formed under the sand. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (purple).

string.name: desc
string.value: A glittering mineral that possesses the mysterious power of the moon.

string.name: desc

string.value: Transparent jewel ore. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (white).

string.name: desc
string.value: An ore of a crystal that contains dark power. It can be refined to obtain rare magic powder (black).

string.name: desc
string.value: A raw ore of a gem that contains the power of time.

string.value: A red jewel. Used for level 8 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.value: A purple jewel. Used for level 2 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.value: A blue jewel. Used for level 7 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.value: A blue, transparent jewel. Used for level 3 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yellow jewel. Used for level 6 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transparent jewel. Used for level 7 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dark power sleeps within this rare crystal. Used for level 9 equipment, accessory, and alchemy crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glittering jewel that possesses a mysterious power of a star.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fascinating gem that contains the power of time.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal that can be extracted from equipment. Contains the elemental attributes of that item. Mainly used to craft level 40- 60 items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal that can be extracted from equipment. Contains the elemental attributes of that item. Mainly used to craft level 70- 90 items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal that can be extracted from equipment. Contains the elemental attributes of that item. Mainly used to craft level 100- 120 items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal that can be extracted from equipment. Contains the elemental attributes of that item. Mainly used to craft level 130+ items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone containing the concentrated power of the Alchemist. Used in equipment fusion.\nPurchase it from Nack in Ardentmill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone that contains the condensed dreams of the Black Mage.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment containing pure confusion. Don't ask how that works. There's a small chance of obtaining it by hunting Lv. 180 or higher monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: This odd stone looks solid but shifts like a liquid. It's chock full of Alchemical potential. There's a small chance of finding it by extracting Level 105 or higher equipment. The higher the equipment's level, the higher the chance.

string.name: desc
string.value: They say this stone dates back to the very formation of the world. Then again, they say lots of things. Occasionally found from Heartstones, Gold Flowers, Mysterious Ore Veins, Mysterious Legendary Ore Veins, Mysterious Herbs, and Mysterious Legendary Herbs.

string.name: desc
string.value: This rock is so powerful, it can bend time and space. Normal rocks can do that too, but you have to throw them really hard. Used for making powerful equipment and potions. Can be obtained from all monsters at Level 95 or above.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mana crystal that can be extracted from monsters and scrolls. Used widely for crafting mana-intensive items.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the stuff actual spells are made of. This one came from a botched spell. Can be extracted from scrolls or obtained from monsters. Used in mana-intensive crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the stuff actual spells are made of. This one came from a pretty good spell. Can be extracted from scrolls or obtained from monsters. Used in mana-intensive crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the stuff actual spells are made of. This one came from a top-shelf spell. Can be extracted from scrolls or obtained from monsters. Used in mana-intensive crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cube fragment that retains traces of the cube energy, the force governing all cubes. Can be received by extracting Master Craftsman's Cubes, and by mining and from mob/boss drops and used to make Master Craftsman's Cubes and Renowned Master Craftsman's Cubes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The crystallized power of a mystic cube.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment that contains a trace amount of Rebirth Flame. Can be extracted from regular Rebirth Flames and used to make Powerful Rebirth Flames and Eternal Rebirth Flames.

string.name: desc
string.value: The crystallized power of Rebirth Flame.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragment found in the space between Mirror World and Maple World. Used for making #cGold Label Knight Set# items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blade that keeps changing itself. Occasionally found in Mysterious Ore Veins and used for making Master Craftsman's Cubes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stronger Cubic Blade. Occasionally found in Mysterious Legendary Ore Veins and used for making Renowned Master Craftsman's Cubes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The magical essence of dusk itself, occasionally found from Heartstones, Gold Flowers, Mysterious Ore Veins, and Mysterious Herbs. Used in all sorts of crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purified form of Dusk Essence, occasionally found from Mysterious Legendary Ore Veins and Mysterious Herbs. Used in all sorts of crafting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong flame occasionally found in Mysterious Herbs, used for making Powerful Rebirth Flames.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perpetual flame occasionally found in Mysterious Legendary Herbs, used for making Eternal Rebirth Flames.

string.value: An egg of Mimiana, the Mount for knights. Watch the egg grow into a full-grown Mimiana by sharing your experiences with it. Once it matures into a full-grown creature, take it to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass incubator where Mimiana is stored. Drag the food into the incubator to feed Mimiana. Once it matures, take it back to Kiridu the Mount Trainer.

string.value: Golden Chicken Effect was given as a reward for helping Lazy Daisy. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: This effect is for people who helped Lazy Daisy but failed to hatch the egg. You can turn it ON/OFF by double-clicking the icon or using the key configuration menu to assign a shortcut key.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful card with season's greetings. Double click on it to read!

string.name: desc
string.value: These amazing watercolor paints can be used to draw portraits of the Orange Mushroom, Octopus, and Yeti.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: These magical watercolor paints can be used to draw portraits of the Orange Mushroom, Octopus, and Yeti.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of bamboo snapped from Rien. A prime material for building a chair.

string.name: desc
string.value: A wood carved out of a tree from Rien. A prime material for building a chair.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sign of acceptance the Scarred Bear was carrying with. Take it to Sir Blacksmith to get accepted.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red jade that decorated Maha. A portion of Maha's powers is instilled in it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A taxi coupon from Tru. Use the coupon at the cab in Lith Harbor to get one free ride to Henesys.

string.name: desc
string.value: A horn from Orange Mushroom that's on the verge of evolving into a Horny Mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute puppet based on Orange Mushroom, but something about its facial expression seems odd.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute puppet based on Green Mushroom, but something about its facial expression seems odd.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute puppet based on Green Mushroom, but something about its facial expression seems odd.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute puppet based on Ghost Stump, but something about its facial expression seems odd.

string.name: desc
string.value: A report written by 10 Boogies. Better take this to Nineheart.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute doll based on Zombie Mushroom, but something about its facial expression seems odd.

string.name: desc
string.value: A document written by the puppeteer. It looks it like contains the sinister plans of Black Wing.

string.name: desc
string.value: The seal stone of Victoria Island that Black Wing had been desperately looking for. No one knows exactly what the stone is for.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulator that promotes rapid growth. Probably came as a result of the appearance of Giant Nependeath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key that opens the storage. Better take it to Athena Pierce.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key made out of wood.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter that Athena Pierce held on to for a long time. Wonder what's written on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter that Athena Pierce held on to for a long time. The condition of the letter shows its age.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter that Athena Pierce held on to for a long time. It's impossible to see what's written on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Envelope from Lilin. Contains documents related to Black Wing.

string.name: desc
string.value: Vitamins that contain nutrients required for Wolf Cub.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious meal meant for Wolf Cub.

string.name: desc
string.value: Vitamins that contain nutrients essential for wolf in puberty.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special type of water the wolf drinks in order to become an adult.

string.name: desc
string.value: An important ingredient for wolf's Life Water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter handwritten by Lilin. Hand the letter to Tru, the Info Merchant at Lith Harbor, and just follow his directions.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red jade Tititi accidentally lost. Better hand it back to Tititi.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pig tail that is rarely available through pigs. There's not much value in it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A document written by the puppeteer. It looks it like contains the sinister plans of Black Wing. Lilin may be able to decipher this letter.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special form of ink made by the artist of Mu Lung, Jin Jin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warning shot fired by the shadow warrior of Black Wing.

string.name: desc
string.value: A handful of white, cold furball of Muru's.

string.name: desc
string.value: Murupa's Furball. A small leaf is stuck in the ball.

string.name: desc
string.value: Murupia's Furball. Looks like something's growing out of it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Murumuru's Furball. Highly resembles that of a snowman.

string.name: desc
string.value: Murukun's furball. Covers up Murukun's sharp piece of horn.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cap from the Poison Mushroom. It contains potent poison.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pig tail that's saturated with a mysterious herb from El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A destroyed helmet that Helmet Pepe wore.

string.name: desc
string.value: A spear used by Royal Guard Pepe.

string.name: desc
string.value: A horn from Grey Yeti, one of the head security members of King Pepe.

string.name: desc
string.value: A horn from White Yeti, one of the head security members of King Pepe.

string.name: desc
string.value: A horn from Gold Yeti, one of the head security members of King Pepe.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful poisonous spore dropped by the Poison Mushroom. It can penetrate through the barrier of the magic spore once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A certificate that certifies one as a great tester. The more the certificate, the better the chance of being selected as a Great Tester.

string.name: desc
string.value: A seed from a Giant Nependeath. It's very big.

string.name: desc
string.value: A captivating single rose loved by the Witch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A permit that allows one to dig up relics. Talk to Gaga to receive another permit.

string.name: desc
string.value: A relic that looks very rare.

string.value: A relic that appears to be very old.

string.value: A photo album filled with Cassandra's baby pictures.

string.name: desc
string.value: A helmet worn by Helmet Pepe. Put it on to disguise yourself as a Helmet Pepe.

string.name: name
string.value: The Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire

string.name: desc
string.value: The Royal Seal that represents the power of the Mushking Empire.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take this to Cassandra, and exchange it for a pretty Pink Flower Tube.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows one to board Train 999 through Mr. Lim.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sapphire mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

string.value: A ruby mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

string.value: A topaz mounted on Pharaoh Yeti's necklace. Give it to Duarte, and he'll take you to Pharaoh Yeti's tomb.

string.value: A small pot with a flower bud in it. Watch it for 30 minutes to see a flower bloom.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small pot that contains a yellow flower. Take it to Gaga to trade it for a crayon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key that opens that locked chest inside the Halloween Mansion. Drop the key front of the chest to open it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secure bundle of straw that can be used to make the Witch's Broomstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid bundle of straw that can be used to make the Witch's Broomstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong bundle of straw that can be used to make the Witch's Broomstick.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hanging Scroll given to you by the Black Wing Shadow Warrior. The erased content can be restored by using special ink.\r\n#cCan be opened by double-clicking on it with a mouse.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A green-colored foreign object that was blocking the pipes. Looks very dirty.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like a fragment that broke off of something...?

string.name: desc
string.value: Wine would taste great in this bottle.

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks like it belongs to a rock star.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tree stump from Ellinia with a brown tint.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains the memory of Solomon's bow.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Octopus Leg that has been dried to resemble a stick.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wearing this item compels you to listen to some Rock'n Roll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Scroll that contains the Devil's weakness...

string.name: desc
string.value: A statue from Leafre that was lost in Nautilus.

string.name: desc
string.value: The soul of an innocent child.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strange to think that it comes from an animal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can this really be used to start a fire?

string.name: desc
string.value: A long stick made of wood.

string.name: desc
string.value: A curious shell that amplifies sound and reverberates when you scream.

string.name: desc
string.value: A partial sheet of fabric taken from someone's pants.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is the treasure that was so hard to get?! But it does have some strange markings on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this the key to the Treasure Box? Not sure where this is supposed to be used.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extracted portion of the Orange Mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extracted portion of the Octopus.

string.name: desc
string.value: There appears to be strange markings drawn on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Clue found near the Demon's Doorway where Andras is located.

string.name: desc
string.value: Clue found near the Demon's Doorway where Valefor is located.

string.name: desc
string.value: Clue found near the Demon's Doorway where Amdusias is located.

string.name: desc
string.value: Clue found near the Demon's Doorway where Crocell is located.

string.name: desc
string.value: Clue found near the Demon's Doorway where Marbas is located.

string.name: desc
string.value: Smelly leather from a Wild Boar. It's very pungent.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eek, so disgusting...could you really see with that thing?

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute little yellow butterfly. It might fly away if you don't keep your eye on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: An expensive wine made with Orange Mushroom Caps from Victoria Islands.

string.name: desc
string.value: Token indicating the Perion Training Instructor.

string.name: desc
string.value: Music can expose the most painful roots of the heart, but it will always reveal the truth.\r\n#c- Chief Stan -#

string.name: desc
string.value: It's missing some holes, as though it were constructed hastily. But the sound seems to be fine.

string.name: desc
string.value: You must live life with passion, so that the rest of the world might learn how to live.\r\n#c- Dark Lord -#

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks quite ordinary for a supposedly legendary bow.

string.name: desc
string.value: Blast this song until the rhythm pumps your blood and the chorus echoes through your bones...\r\n#c- Kyrin -#

string.name: desc
string.value: A large replica of a coin made by Shumi. Looks very desirable.

string.name: desc
string.value: An eraser made by collecting slime liquids. Use it on the dirty Treasure Map.

string.name: desc
string.value: Its heat is strong enough to evaporate water from afar. Use it on the Slightly Cleaned Treasure Map.

string.name: desc
string.value: I will love my life just as I love the melody of this song.(Use it on the dirty Treasure Map.)\r\n#c- Ayan -#

string.name: desc
string.value: A Sack containing Ink. Use it on the dirty Treasure Map.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the demon Andras who was sealed up in Perion. It allows you to enter the location in which Andras resides.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the demon Amdusias who was sealed up in Henesys. It allows you to enter the location in which Amdusias resides.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the demon Valefor who was sealed up in Kerning City. It allows you to enter the location in which Valefor resides.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the demon Crocell who was sealed up in Nautilus. It allows you to enter the location in which Crocell resides.

string.name: desc
string.value: Emblem of the demon Marbas who was sealed up in Ellinia. It allows you to enter the location in which Marbas resides.

string.name: desc
string.value: A necklace proving that you defeated a Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure map given by Kyrin. There are three sections--red, green, and white--that are invisible. The green section should be cleaned first. \r\n\r\n*If you don't need the item anymore, just go to Jack in the Top Floor - Hallway to discard it.#

string.value: A tasty piece of cheese, the main dish for mice.

string.name: desc
string.value: The other half of Eels's necklace. A perfect tft it with Eels's pendant.

string.name: desc
string.value: Eels's pendant that is finally seeing its original night of day. It looks like it might have some mysterious power in it.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is Timer's egg. It's too hard to crack. Ghosthunter Bob must know what to do with this.

string.name: desc
string.value: This little worm lives in Ludirium. It's so small it's not at all threatening.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Snipe that has lost her way. Take her and move up to a high point, where she can use the launch pad-like area to try to fly her way back home.

string.name: desc
string.value: As long as you have this with you, the Moon Bunny will give you the Sweet Rice Cake 5 times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A single slice of beef. Marinate it, then grill it to try to make the Fire Grill Skewer.

string.name: desc
string.value: A single slice of dried mushroom. Mix it with some seasoning to make a Fire Grill Skewer.

string.name: desc
string.value: A whole bellflower that can be used as part of the Fire Grill Skewer if soaked in salt water

string.name: desc
string.value: Simply a Fire Grill Skewer placed on a pretty dish. Nothing says Thank You quite like a nice dish of Fire Grill Skewer.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful flower that apparently only grows on the moon. Constantly glitters, thanks to all that moonlight it's been soaking up.

string.name: desc
string.value: The first piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

string.name: desc
string.value: The second piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

string.name: desc
string.value: The third piece of photo of the moon. Collect the other two, and it'll turn into a photo of a beautiful full moon. Place the pictures inside the envelope to make sure they don't rip.

string.value: A soft feather presumably from a baby bird. Gaga will definitely like this.

string.value: A seed that grows into a Spring Flower.

string.name: desc
string.value: The petals that make up the Spring Flower.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dazzling sunlight filled with the feeling of spring.

string.name: desc
string.value: Glistening sunlight filled with the feeling of spring.

string.value: A Taxi coupon given to you by Neinheart. If you're in Ellinia, a taxi will take you to Henesys for free 1 time.

string.name: desc
string.value: A photo of the moon that hasn't developed yet. The image should become more vivid in 30 minutes. The photo will disappear if you log out!

string.name: desc
string.value: A faint photo of the moon that hasn't been fully developed yet. The image should become more vivid in 30 minutes. The photo will disappear if you log out!

string.name: desc
string.value: A blurry photo of the moon that hasn't been fully developed yet. The image should become more vivid in 30 minutes. The photo will disappear if you log out!

string.name: desc
string.value: A clear photo of the moon. This will certainly make the Baby Moon Bunny happy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A holiday fairy got trapped in a gift box! Cliff is looking for missing fairies, to take this box to Happyville.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box stolen by Rudolph, the red-nosed delinquent.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extract of moss gathered from the dragon habitat. It is an effective treatment for various illness suffered by the Halflingers and is also used in the production of a potion used for flying.

string.name: desc
string.value: Red fabric that is great at insulating heat.

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure chest from a shipwreck.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red undergarment that Mrs. Ming Ming made for the townspeople. Wearing the thermals will bring much warmth.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fluff that might be even lighter than air. It's mostly used to craft winter clothes for fairies. It's so light that it floats around and is often caught high on tree branches.

string.name: desc
string.value: Firewood that is still burning. It can often be found inside Dark Axe Stumps that have been hit by lightning.

string.name: desc
string.value: An item that warms up your cold hands and feet during winter. Rubbing the pack will trigger a heat reaction.

string.name: desc
string.value: Boiling lava that is extremely hot and dangerous. You can cool it down by taking it over to the Rock Covered in Snow.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare plant found in the Ant Tunnel. It exudes heat from its petals and does not freeze even during the harshest of winters.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small tea bag full of red tea leaves. Steep it in hot water to enjoy the wonderful flavor of red tea.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lava that has been air-cooled to the perfect temperature. It has just the right amount of heat to warm up your room.

string.name: desc
string.value: A thick piece of matted wool. It is widely used to make all sorts of items with its texture and various colors.

string.name: desc
string.value: The base layer of a military jumper that provides an excellent thermal effect.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cotton that is woven in squares in between two pieces of fabric.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bubble from the submarine volcano that contains warm air.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious stone found in Minar Forest that exudes heat.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll containing a secret method on how to exude body heat to survive the cold.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare bellflower bud that can be consumed after boiling or as a pill to enhance your health and resistance against the cold.

string.name: desc
string.value: Red sand found in the desert of Ariant. It is the main ingredient of the Heat Pack, as it triggers a heat reaction when rubbed against a surface.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extremely solid piece of iron that does not cool down quickly. It is used to build a heating apparatus.

string.name: desc

string.value: A photo of Hodori. Take it over to Cassandra.

string.value: A legendary item that can supposedly grant you the power of insight. Take it over to Lady Syl.

string.name: desc
string.value: A calabash in which the King Sage Cat is sealed. It must be delivered to Arec in El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter to Lady Syl from Arec. It's better to not open the letter because of its confidentiality.

string.name: desc
string.value: A map piece which a place in Perion has been marked. Collect 20 pieces to see the complete map.

string.value: A Dual Blade seal that was installed in a Bubbling.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warning: Telling lies while consuming this lollipop will induce severe sneezing.\nRecommendation: No more than 10 per day. Excessive consumption may result in cavities.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unofficial history book of Magatia that was purchased from Han the Broker. It is a forbidden book that contains the hidden history of Magatia.

string.name: desc
string.value: A note containing ambiguous scribbles. It seems to be a diagram with an explanation of a pentacle, but only an alchemist would be able to fully understand it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fake Sand Bandit emblem that Jano prepared. Most people would surely fall for it.

string.name: desc
string.value: An extremely old root from an aged bellflower named Guon near Herb Town. It appears to have effects just as miraculous as those of ginseng.

string.name: desc
string.value: A new medicine that Mr. Do invented. People are not certain whether it is poisonous. Do NOT consume even when offered.

string.name: desc
string.value: A document Chumji ripped up and threw away. You might be able to read what it says if you collect all the pieces and put them together.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sturdy claw made out of Hodori's leather. It cannot be equipped.

string.name: desc
string.value: The uniform Hogul was wearing. It cannot be equipped.

string.value: A cute bow Agent M lost. Could Agent M have tried to wear it himself?

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter Korin wrote to Agent M. Being the stereotypical girl, Korin wrote on pink stationery.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gloves that Sarah made. Judging from the white laces, the gloves appear to be made for weddings.

string.name: desc

string.value: Gloves that Sarah made for Nana. They seem quite valuable.

string.value: A present to Korin from Agent M.

string.value: An energy cartridge received from Android Zechtok-2000. Take it to Dolcetta-2000.

string.value: A guide that has all the commands for the White Duck.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that has all the commands for the Skunk.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the guide.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide that has the information on how to obtain the 6th Anniversary Puzzle Pieces. Read this book and you can be a Puzzle King too!

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide for citizens. \n#cDouble-click on the item to open it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A guide for Mercedes. \n#cDouble-click to open it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Part of a diary written by Aria. It's full of personal things, but has been damaged to the point that there are only few sections that you can actually read.\n#cDouble-click on the item to open the book.#

string.name: desc
string.value: You, too, can become a Mesoranger! A guide that helps anyones with becoming a Mesoranger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A book made out of Moni's letter. Moni probably made it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A diary in which you can read all about the 7th Anniversary event. You can also see how close you are to earning a Joyous 7th Medal and your progress on the Rising Star mission. \n#cDouble-click to read.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A book which can be used to check event paricipation status.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation, as well as rewards.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A farming journal in which you can check the number days spent cultivating Tasty Watermelons.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your progress.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret recipe book in which you can check your progress in Special Fruit Sundae crafting.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A collection of pirate treasure maps.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your participation status and rewards.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A book which can be used to check how many Monkey Dolls you have recovered.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your recovery status and rewards.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret guide to making legendary fruit juices. This is just what you need to become a Legendary Fruit Juice Master! You can also record your juice-making triumphs in here.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your current juice-making record.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A strategy journal that records all the activities of Eco Mapleteers. If you use the Going Green skill once a day, mark it down in this book.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your Eco Mapleteer activity record.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A monster mop-up journal from the Administrator. You can receive a stamp in it once a day by defeating 200 monsters.\r\n#cDouble-click on it to check your monster mop-up record and rewards.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Record your memories from Legends, and make them last forever! By receiving and completing a Making Memories event once a day, your memories will be automatically recorded. Double-click to check.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small, crunchy snack dropped by a monster. It has a hard shell and requires a Peanut Machine to crack.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hard Ice Cube dropped by a monster. Use a Microwave to defrost it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small key that can be obtained from monsters or purchased from the General Store. Use it on the #cMagic Music Box# to see the secret items that the heroes have been collecting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gem that can be obtained from monsters. Use it on the #cCrystal Scale# to see the secret items within.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bag of scented herbs that can be obtained from monsters or purchased from the General Store. Drop it in the #cMagical Teapot# to reveal secret items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A clear mirror glass that can be obtained from monsters. Use it on the #cMermaid Mirror# to see the secret items within.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emerald mirror glass that can be obtained from monsters. Use it on the #cEmerald Mirror# to see the secret items within.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pink mirror glass that can be obtained from monsters or purchased from the General Store. Use it on #cSpinel's Mirror# to see the secret items within.

string.name: desc
string.value: Place this Magiquill Pen on the #Magical Book# to unlock the enchantment and acquire a mysterious item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Place this Philosoquill Pen on the #Philosopher's Book# to unlock the enchantment and acquire a mysterious item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Place this Infiniquill Pen on the #Infinity Book# to unlock the enchantment and acquire a mysterious item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box made of enchanted stone. Use a #cStone Seal Breaker# to unseal this box and obtain magical items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill up a #cFairy Vial# with Fairy Tears to unseal the rare items within.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Chaos Box contains various items. Use #cChaos Purification Stone# to unlock it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Insert a Cryptic Stone in this Cryptic Chest to obtain #can amazing item#.

string.name: desc
string.value: The 6th Anniversary Jigsaw Puzzle. Complete the puzzle to see a picture of a birthday party.

string.name: desc
string.value: An energy cartridge from an Android. Energy must be charged with EXP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical heart from an android. Energy must be charged with EXP, just like the Energy Cartridge.

string.name: desc
string.value: A silver coin created to commemorate MapleStory's 6th Anniversary. It's only circulated during the 6th Anniversary period and has variety of uses.

string.name: desc
string.value: An icy blue pick used for playing the guitar. You can take it to Mrs. Bo to purchase a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin engraved with a full moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal containing Lion King's special power. It shines with a weak silver glow, as it hasn't been purified completely.

string.name: desc
string.value: A medal containing Lion King's special power. It shines with a bright gold glow, as it has been purified completely.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin-shaped snowdrop. You can purchase items from Inkwell with these coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emblem gifted by the god of war. An unknown power radiates from it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red button. These can be used to purchase items from Inkwell.

string.name: desc
string.value: A memorial coin distributed to the tourists of Maple World. Collecting these coins will come in handy later on.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special coin to commemorate the Monster Park. Take it to Laku at the Monster Park to trade it for a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative coin given to visitors to Dolphin Island. The back of the coin features Pason's signature.\n#cGather up 4 and bring them to Pason to trade them for a Traveling Pouch.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative coin given to those who visit the cherry blossoms. The back of the coin features the signature of Chief Stan.\n#cGather up 4 and bring them to Chief Stan to trade them for a Traveling Pouch.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure hunt note featuring a picture of a bomb. That probably means it's no good.\n#cGather up the 'You Lose' notes and bring them to Hooper, the merchant, to trade them for food items.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin to commemorate MapleStory's 7th Anniversary. You can only find these during the 7th Anniversary celebration. You can use them to buy Joy Bird Feathers, which Inkwell can then use to upgrade Maple Beryl equipment into Crimson Maple equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coin used during the Legends Awards. Can be used to purchase various useful items in the Legends Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: A meter that can measure damage.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra gave you this journal to help manage your Honey Butterfly. Double-click to dress up or play with your butterfly. It's only available during the event period, so don't wait to try it out!

string.name: desc
string.value: A pot from Mommy Bellflower.\r\n#cDouble-click to watch Baby Bellflower sleep soundly.#\r\nThe growing bellflower will disappear if you log out, and a new one will grow from this pot when you log back in. #c(Only up to 5 times a day)#

string.value: In the Beginning, There Was a Mushroom

string.name: desc
string.value: A book containing the secrets and origins of many monsters, written by the Scholarly 'Shroom.\n#cDouble-click to open the book.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This sloppy Rock-Paper-Scissors Ticket says #c'teeket'#. Pipsqueak Zakum needs some spelling lessons.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tail of an Evil Eye that used to live in the Ancient Cave. It's glossy and lustrous, unlike the tails of those other loser Evil Eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drop it on the portal in the room to rotate the room's destination once clockwise.

string.name: desc
string.value: Drop it on the portal in the room to rotate the room's destination once counterclockwise.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A medicinal herb that's known for fast fatigue recovery. It turns poisonous after awhile, so deliver it to La Me in Mu Lung swiftly.

string.name: desc
string.value: Leavings of contaminated goblins. Drop contaminated goblin spirits one by one to grow the herb.

string.name: desc
string.value: This key opens the chest with the candle. Drop the key next to the box in the Haunted Mansion Main Hall.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh, warm Brown Rice Cake made just minutes ago.

string.name: desc
string.value: Chief Stan's map of Maple World.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle fit for holding juice or maybe a letter to float away into the ocean.

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like an Orange Mushroom, but there's something creepy in the eyes.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like a Blue Mushroom, but there's something creepy in the eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute doll that was modeled after a Golem.

string.value: It looks like a Ghost Stump, but there's something creepy in the eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute doll that was modeled after a Blue Mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sample of Cold Eye cells. Take it to Dr. Betty.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sample of Surgeon Eye cells. Take it to Dr. Betty.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Rapid Growth Accelerant. It must be what made the Giant Nependeath appear.

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like a Green Mushroom, but there's something creepy in the eyes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tauromacis blood has a nasty habit of luring evil.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cute doll that was modeled after a Golem.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shattered piece of stone. It's the favorite food of Dargoth, a Black Wing Boss.

string.name: desc
string.value: A flask of water from the Fairy Fountain. Sparkly!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Thin Jr. Necki Skin that JM's client asked him to fetch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Red Sand Crystal that you obtained after gathering Red Sand Powders. If you drop 1 to 7 of them under the tree in the right corner of the tower's 29th floor, you can move on to the next floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: The loss of beauty across this fair world so saddens me. I have in my possession the power of immortality, which I shall grant to only the most beautiful souls. - Hilla -

string.name: desc
string.value: A mushroom bulb used to decorate the fancy Mushroom Chandelier.

string.name: desc
string.value: Iron armor made for a mushroom.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a picture of Violetta's banner. It is one of her symbols.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a picture of Violetta's portrait. It is one of her symbols.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a picture of Violetta's statue. It is one of her symbols.

string.name: desc
string.value: A helm worn by a viking. Wear it to look like a viking, if you're into that.

string.name: desc
string.value: A key held by the workers in the Galley. It may unlock Violetta's chains.

string.name: desc
string.value: A miraculous potion that heals a mushroom of all ailments.

string.name: desc
string.value: A puzzle piece required to enter the Captain's Quarters.

string.name: desc
string.value: This odd substance from the Water Thief Monster has something written on it...

string.name: desc
string.value: A ribbon from a Red Ribbon Pig. It's worth investigating.

string.name: desc
string.value: A worn-out diary. It has 'Soo' written on it. It's in too bad of a shape to read.

string.name: desc
string.value: A worn-out diary. It has 'Shin' written on it. It's in such bad shape that you can't read it.

string.name: desc
string.value: This odd substance from the Water Thief Monster has something written on it...

string.name: desc
string.value: Dried caterpillar jerky. It's a yummy food for baby foxes.

string.name: desc
string.value: These are the wings of a ladybug. They make good meals for baby foxes.

string.name: desc
string.value: An egg stolen from a sparrow's nest. It makes a delicious treat for foxes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tail from a Balloon Mouse. It's a yummy fox treat.

string.name: desc
string.value: Frog legs from a Red Poison Frog. Be careful, they're poisonous all over.

string.name: desc
string.value: Frog legs from a Green Poison Frog. Be careful, it's poisonous all over.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fuzzy feather from a Delinquent Chick. It's covered in rebellious hair wax.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fuzzy feather from a Punk Chick. It's covered in hard rock hair wax.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fur from a hyena's back. Nice spots.

string.name: desc
string.value: A long fang from a hyena. It symbolizes bravery, because someone had to go in there to get it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Red Sand Powder dropped by a Red Sand Dwarf. Used to explore the 29th floor of the Tower of Oz. If you gather 10 Red Sand Powders, a Red Sand Crystal will appear beneath a tree on the left.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of yellow leather dropped by a Yellow Curly Cow. It's thin and light and doesn't tear easily. It would be great for clothing, but you have to use it to open the portal.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of purple leather dropped by a Purple Curly Cow. It's a bit thick, but still looks luxurious. Get enough to escape the floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A substance from an Orange Ancient Slime. Gather 10 of this stuff and drop them on the Burning Altar to summon an Orange Ancient Slime.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Ancient Blue Turtle's egg. Would make quite an omelet.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Ancient Orange Turtle's egg. Would make quite a breakfast.

string.name: desc
string.value: Nothing can resist the itch this nasty stuff causes. Use it to see how a Mushroom House reacts.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Black Wings security pass will get you into most internal elevators.

string.name: desc
string.value: A really cheesy figurine of Gold Richie, but you need it for the Owner of the Safe event.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A memory chip from Guard Robot E.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice storage bag to make sure to keep Roo-D from getting scratched up. VERY heavy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A photo of two kids smiling in old Edelstein.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extracted from a Homunculus. The enchantments have the ability to reveal truths.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice lunch packed by Mrs. Ming Ming's.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bruce lost this water bottle in the Golem's Temple. There's still water inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A thank you gift, used to keep food chilled.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fan letter to Angelic Buster from Cartalion in Pantheon. Reading this letter would be a big no-no.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter from Nathania. It states why the delivery was late.

string.name: desc
string.value: Professor Dreamboat's pile of unread books.

string.name: desc
string.value: An entertaining book picked out by Professor Dreamboat. For some reason, it says 'Goodbye blue Monday' on the inside cover...

string.name: desc
string.value: From Promathus. Give it to Brighton, and tell him to take a vacation.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful Dahlia. Give it to Belle.

string.name: desc
string.value: A handmade teddy bear for Checky. It's made of love.

string.value: A circuit part that still seems usable.

string.value: Maroon made this for Tiro, but you do NOT want to know what is in it.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Renewal Discount#\nA special gift from Cole for level 7-8 miners. Lets you enter the secret mine through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The mine has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter three times a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cCrafting Renewal Discount#\nA special gift from Saffron for level 7-8 herbalists. Lets you enter the secret herb patch through the portal in the lower level of #cArdentmill#. The herb patch has a #c10 minute time limit#.\nYou can enter three times a day.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A treasure hunt note with a picture of a bomb. This probably means your lose.\n#cYou can gather up these 'You Lose' notes and trade them for something tasty from Hooper.

string.name: desc
string.value: A beautiful red maple leaf. #cCan only be used during the 7th Anniversary Event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone that contains the power of Virtue. When you have the stone in possession, a gauge will fill each time you hit a monster. When the gauge is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the gauge will no longer fill up. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

string.value: A key that can open the gates of the Aerial Prison.

string.value: A piece of ice so cold that just touching it may freeze your fingers.

string.value: An orange brick made by JM from Mud Clumps. Take it to the Dark Lord.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold Richie's delivery box that has a diamond Emblem engraved on it, and is wrapped with golden tape. The insides are unknown, since it is so tightly sealed.\n#Disappears if you log out.#

string.value: A red fruit from Megran. Unlike its sweet appearance, it is very bitter and is used as a rare medicine ingredient.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon worn by Stumpy. It is old and worn out.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green alligator leather from Dyle. Unlike other alligator leather, it is very big.

string.name: desc
string.value: A long black tail from Faust.

string.name: desc
string.value: A claw from King Clang. It is sharp and bumpy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A necklace from the Nine-Tailed Fox. It is decorated with a very fine jade.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gloves that were worn by Zeno. They're made from unknown material that is very light, yet strong.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple crystal from a monster. It is used as one of Gaga's research materials.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ignition key that will test Gold Richie's special weapon. It is painted in gold, and Gold Richie's diamond emblem is engraved on it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Ratz caught in a mouse trap.

string.name: desc
string.value: Syrup made from the sweet-and-sour red mango. It's clear and shines brightly with red.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extract from a yellow gardenia fruit. It's perfect for food coloring.

string.name: desc
string.value: A needle from a pine tree. Adds extra flavor to Song Pyun treats.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Glutinous Rice Flour made from rice. Great for rice cakes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sheet music to the legendary piece, Moonlight Sonata. Due to its rarity, it's traded at a high price among hard-core collectors.

string.name: desc
string.value: A metal cylinder used to make a music box.

string.name: desc
string.value: A music box that plays Moonlight Sonata when wound up. It was specially created by Gold Richie.

string.name: desc
string.value: Jenn's brother who was trapped in the Lion King's Castle. Better bring him to Jenn.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-consumable piece of anniversary cake dropped by all mobs and anniversary cake mobs. These items will continually drop throughout the event. Since after 3 hours the town returns to a neutral state, this allows players to strategize their attacks. Town Cake Piece turn in total will be at zero at event start and will also return to zero 3 hours after an invasion, when the town returns to neutral state.

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-consumable piece of anniversary pie dropped by all mobs and anniversary pie mobs. These items will continually drop throughout the event. Since after 3 hours the town returns to a neutral state, this allows players to strategize their attacks. Town Pie Piece turn in total will be at zero at event start and will also return to zero 3 hours after an invasion, when the town returns to neutral state.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dr. De Lang has prepared this lab pass for his daughter Keeny. How sweet.

string.name: desc
string.value: Humanoid A has donated his mechanical heart for Neo Huroid. Now THAT'S dedication.

string.name: desc
string.value: Keeny has drawn up this pentacle design. She thinks it'll work, but has absolutely no data to back that up.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dr. De Lang actually managed to repair this heart. He really is a genius!

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic stone that is the core of Bedin's alchemical knowledge. Maybe he wears it like a hat.

string.name: desc
string.value: Russellon wrote up his findings in this report. Hope it's not boring.

string.name: desc
string.value: The original title, <Alchemy for Unbelievably Stupid Morons Like You (Yes, You)> did not attract many sales.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: The Shadow Knights have written this report based on their operations in Edelstein.

string.name: desc
string.value: A concentrated poison made by the Poison Gas Generator. Can knock you out just by looking at it!

string.name: desc
string.value: Guaranteed to lose your moments like tears in the rain! Time to buy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A particle that fuels all sorts of time shenanigans.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Rumor has it there's a teddy bear inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice, shiny coin earned by working yourself to the bone at the Toy Factory. Use it to get a candy from the Gumball Machine!

string.value: Aran showed you yet another seal stone. This one is minty fresh!

string.name: desc
string.value: Evan gave you this document from the onyx dragon, Afrien, containing a guide to the seal stones. The content is brief, and only people with a deep knowledge of magic can understand it. In short, a seal stone consists of three components. First, you need a medium for the continent that will act as the core of the seal stone. Second, you need five different powers. And third, a strong will to bring peace and prevent destruction must bring it all together.

string.name: desc
string.value: Astilda gave you this magical score. Use it to add music to Elluel's Music Box.

string.name: desc
string.value: Empress Cygnus gave you this big square. If you write a message on it and hang it outside, then Phantom might see it. That being said...why does the Empress has such an odd thing with her?

string.value: A key cobbled together from the memories of the Heart Tree. It should give you access to Gollux, but will break due to its poor construction. You can get 3 of these each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bolt that's really showing its age. The threads are stripped too, like it was yanked out. Not good.

string.value: A secret fuel that Black Wing Androids use. One pump can keep them running almost forever!

string.name: desc
string.value: A chicken Leg from Von Bon. It's pretty big.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: The soul of a bear. This food will literally have 'soul' if you cook with this.r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A monster's tentacle. It looks disgusting, but some say it's pretty delicious.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's very fresh, just fresh.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A colorful mushroom. Let's hope it's not poisonous\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: An Evil Spirit Seal Stone. Am I getting controlled by this stone?\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: Very tough monster meat. It's really hard to chew and it tastes like squid.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: A thick meat loaf. It looks delicious.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a Heart Key which allows you to open the hearts of people who are eating lunch. You could use it to have people change their mind.\r\n\r\nIt's one of the ingredients for the delicious lunch, and #cif you have 3 of them regardless of type, you will be able to make a delicious lunch by double clicking them.#Do not be afraid and go ahead!

string.name: desc
